jsky.util.gui
Class ClipboardHelper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--jsky.util.gui.ClipboardHelper
public final class ClipboardHelper
extends java.lang.Object

Utility shortcuts for accessing the system clipboard. This uses the standard Java APIs.
